name: Tock
domains: Craft, Creation, Force, Knowledge, Law, Mentalism, Mind, Time
interfaithblessing: +1 on attack rolls and skill checks
worshippers: Tock is worshiped by craftsman and inventors, particularly among the gnomes of Stagenheim, whom he has blessed with great knowledge and skill with crafts.
allowedalignments: Lawful Good, Lawful Neutral, Lawful Evil
appearance: Tock has the appearance of a living machine in the shape of a halfling or gnome.  He is studded with exposed gears and wires, and wears only a monacle.  He is typically seen carrying one or more thick tomes and is often writing furiously in one or more of them.
dogma: Tock teaches that one should enrich oneself by taking advantage of the laws and forces of the universe to create new and interesting things. One should seek knowledge and the strengthening of ones mind in order to aid one in this effort. He is also the God of Clocks and Clockwork, and makes sure that time moves forward in its regular course.
clergy: The clergy of Tock are usually great craftsman in their own right, and his temple provides a bounty for particularly interesting ideas so that their inventors can build and test them.
